statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT product_id, seller_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE seller_id = 101;
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 201 AND rating < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, seller_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 101;
SELECT product_id, seller_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id, seller_id;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price, review_text FROM products JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE products.product_id = 5;
SELECT seller_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY seller_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT product_name, product_description, review_text FROM products LEFT JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics'
SELECT seller_name, seller_location FROM sellers ORDER BY seller_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT seller_name, rating FROM sellers JOIN reviews ON sellers.seller_id = reviews.seller_id
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT seller_name, seller_location FROM sellers ORDER BY seller_name DESC;
SELECT rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT seller_name, seller_location, product_name FROM sellers s JOIN products p ON s.seller_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sellers s JOIN products p ON s.seller_id = p.product_id JOIN reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT seller_name, seller_email FROM sellers WHERE seller_name = 'XYZ Seller';
SELECT review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%T-shirt%';
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT seller_name, seller_email FROM sellers WHERE seller_id = 1;
SELECT count(*) AS total_reviews FROM product_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT product_name, seller_name FROM products JOIN sellers ON products.product_id = sellers.seller_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT seller_name, review FROM Sellers WHERE seller_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM SellerReviews;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews CR INNER JOIN Customers C ON CR.customer_id = C.customer_id WHERE CR.rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY CR.review_id DESC
SELECT PR.product_name, SR.review, SR.rating FROM Products PR JOIN SellerReviews SR ON PR.product_id = SR.review_id WHERE SR.rating <= 3.0 ORDER BY PR.price ASC

SELECT C.customer_name, PR.price, CR.review, CR.rating FROM Customers C INNER JOIN CustomerReviews CR ON C.customer_id = CR.customer_id JOIN Products PR ON CR.product_id = PR.product_id WHERE CR.rating > 4.0 AND PR.price < 100 ORDER BY C.customer_name
SELECT S.seller_name, SR.review, SR.rating FROM Sellers S INNER JOIN SellerReviews SR ON S.seller_id = SR.seller_id WHERE SR.rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY SR.rating DESC, S.seller_name ASC

SELECT CR.review, CR.rating, C.customer_name, C.email FROM CustomerReviews CR JOIN Customers C ON CR.customer_id = C.customer_id WHERE CR.rating > 3.0 AND C.email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY C.customer_name ASC
